decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to quickly overwhelm and overpower the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. By utilizing efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Seasoned Pyromancer, as well as powerful spells like Galvanic Discharge and Thraben Charm, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of cards like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah provide additional win conditions and board control. With a mix of creature aggression and spell-based burn, this Boros Aggro deck aims to be a relentless force on the battlefield.

The deck focuses on using creatures with undying abilities, such as Young Wolf and Badgermole Cub, in combination with Yawgmoth, Thran Physician to create a recurring engine of sacrificing and drawing cards. This allows for a toolbox approach to finding specific creatures for different situations, supported by cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Agatha's Soul Cauldron. The deck also includes combo pieces like Walking Ballista and Malevolent Rumble for finishing off opponents. The land base includes utility lands like Boseiju, Who Endures and Spymaster's Vault to support the deck's strategy.

The key concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creature spells like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, while also using support spells like Galvanic Discharge and Thraben Charm to control the battlefield. The deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent by consistently playing threats and using cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Goblin Bombardment to push for damage. Additionally, utilizing cards like Arena of Glory and Voice of Victory to boost the team's power and protect key creatures.

The deck focuses on assembling a toolbox of creatures that can be searched for and utilized to create a powerful combo. By using cards like Yawgmoth, Thran Physician and Agatha's Soul Cauldron, along with various support cards, the deck can control the board and generate value from sacrificing and recurring creatures. It also includes some disruption with Malevolent Rumble and provides consistency with tutors like Green Sun's Zenith. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a versatile array of threats and synergies.

This deck focuses on aggressive creatures such as Ragavan, Territorial Kavu, and Phlage, supported by powerful spells like Consign to Memory and Lightning Bolt. Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding provide additional consistency and control, while Quantum Riddler and Scion of Draco offer versatility and resilience. Fable of the Mirror-Breaker helps to disrupt opponent strategies, while Arena of Glory adds a powerful anthem effect. The mana base is carefully crafted to ensure consistent access to all colors of mana needed for the deck's powerful spells and creatures.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of powerful creatures like Elesh Norn and Scion of Draco, along with disruptive spells like Utopia Sprawl and Leyline of the Guildpact. The deck utilizes cards like Delighted Halfling and Outcaster Trailblazer to maintain board presence and generate advantage. By using Planeswalkers like Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner and Garruk Wildspeaker, along with powerful spells like Storm the Festival, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory. Additionally, Karn, the Great Creator provides utility and access to powerful artifacts to further dominate the game.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of powerful spell and artifact cards to quickly assemble a win condition without relying on traditional lands. By ramping up mana with Lotus Bloom and using cards like Hydroelectric Specimen and Tameshi, Reality Architect to generate additional resources, players can control the board with counterspells like Spell Snare and disrupt opponents with cards like Disrupting Shoal and Sink into Stupor. The ultimate goal is to combo off with Goblin Charbelcher or other high impact spells to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory.

This deck focuses on maximizing aggressive creatures and utilizing powerful enchantments to control the board and deal damage quickly. Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, Territorial Kavu, and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury provide early pressure, while Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding help maintain aggression and disruption. Consign to Memory and Stubborn Denial offer versatile answers, while Teferi, Time Raveler adds flexibility and card advantage. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the diverse color requirements of the deck, allowing for consistent and explosive plays.

The deck revolves around quickly finding and playing Allosaurus Rider to cheat out big creatures like Griselbrand or Ghalta, Stampede Tyrant. Using Neoform and Eldritch Evolution to tutor for specific creatures, along with ramp from Disciple of Freyalise and Generous Ent, the deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces to overwhelm the opponent. Pact spells provide protection and consistency, while card draw and manipulation helps to assemble the combo quickly. Boseiju, Who Endures can help protect key spells from countermagic, while the deck's land base supports its mana requirements.

The main objective of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using creatures like Allosaurus Rider and Ghalta, Stampede Tyrant, and then utilize combo pieces like Neoform and Eldritch Evolution to assemble a powerful board state. The deck also includes protection spells like Pact of Negation and Veil of Summer to ensure the combo can resolve without interruption. Additionally, cards like Xenagos, God of Revels and Atraxa, Grand Unifier provide additional support and synergies to help overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

The focus of this deck is to quickly deploy artifacts onto the battlefield and use them to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By using cards like Memnite, Mishra's Bauble, and Mox Opal to generate early mana advantage, along with efficient removal spells like Engineered Explosives and Metallic Rebuke, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining a steady stream of threats. The addition of Urza's Saga provides additional value and card advantage, allowing the deck to maintain pressure and close out games quickly.

The deck focuses on quickly generating mana and casting a combination of spells to either win the game outright with cards like Grapeshot or overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of spells. It includes cards that help draw into combo pieces or refill the hand, as well as cards that can recur spells from the graveyard. The deck aims to create explosive turns and outmaneuver the opponent by efficiently utilizing the mana resources available. Varying win conditions and flexible card choices allow for adaptability in different situations.

The deck focuses on a powerful combo strategy that revolves around generating card advantage and mana with artifacts like Mox Opal and Mox Amber, while also utilizing Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Emry, Lurker of the Loch to dig for combo pieces. The goal is to set up a board state where all the pieces come together to create a massive burst of spells and generate a win condition through cards like Song of Creation, Malevolent Rumble, and Grapeshot. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of spells and combo off for victory.

This deck focuses on using cheap, efficient creatures and burn spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage quickly. It leverages cards like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Monastery Swiftspear to apply pressure early, supported by spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart to remove blockers and finish off the opponent. The deck also includes card draw and selection spells like Preordain and Expressive Iteration to maintain card advantage and ensure a steady stream of threats. The mana base is carefully crafted to ensure consistent access to both red and blue mana sources.
